data.message: Coca-Cola is killing people, the amounts of sugar in your drinks is a joke...... and as for Coke Zero which I loved until I read the ingredients and found that it contains ASPARTAME! Which is proven to cause leukaemia and all other things!!! You guys should be ashamed of yourselves, thousands of people including children are drinking this poison every day!? Do your research next time

replies.message: Dont drink water either, its proven to cause drowning

Dont do anything. Everything you do will kill you in the end. Best put that mug down carefully. And be steady where you walk. Never know what could happen 🤗 might step on a crack and fall to the center of the earth. 😊
He read it on Facebook. It must be true
That is true, every body drink Coca Cola take poison . Don't kill yours self.
